QuestData.Title: Report to Lord Devrestrasz
QuestData.Description: I abhor the loss of life... any life. But I will not stand idly by and allow Malygos to kill us and defile the temple!$B$BI have appointed Lord Devrestrasz as the commander of Wyrmrest's defenses.$B$BSpeak with Torastrasza to ride a drake down to him.$B$BPlease lend him your aid, $n. Your involvement with the defense of Wyrmrest will be critical to us prevailing against the blue dragonflight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lord Devrestrasz at Wyrmrest Temple.
QuestData.RewardText: You must be $n. The queen informed me that you would be coming.$B$BIf you are willing, we are in great need of your assistance.
